where.if: (a.user_id like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or a.user_name like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') or b.class_name like concat('%',#{keyWords},'%') )

mapper.select: select user_id userId,password,user_name userName from zj_user_info where user_id =#{userId} and is_delete=0

select a.user_id userId, a.password, a.user_name userName, a.role_id roleId, a.is_delete isDelete, b.class_name className, a.create_time createTime from zj_user_info a left join zj_class_info b on a.class_id = b.class_id
select user_id userId,user_name userName from zj_user_info where class_id =#{classId} and is_delete=0
